title: Ticket #4724: Auto read configuration from /etc/condor/condor.d
description:
/etc/condor/condor.d (or /etc/condor/config.d, or whatever) should be added to the default places searched for the global configuration file. If present all files inside should be parsed similar to LOCAL_CONFIG_DIR. This will allow a pure directory-of-configuration-files solution, potentially simplifying some installations.

This probably depends on #4723: Environment CONDOR_CONFIG should be able to point to a directory.
